pr_title: [ML] Monitor reindex response in DF analytics

timeline.message:
[ML] Monitor reindex response in DF analytics

Examines the reindex response in order to report potential
problems that occurred during the reindexing phase of
data frame analytics jobs.

timeline.bodyText: I think since the reindex task is done, wouldn't we want to mark it as null even when it failed?
timeline.author: benwtrent

timeline.message: Also not allow partial search results on reindex
